thread.title: 'Wreck-It Ralph' Sequel Gets a New Title!
thread.title_full: 'Wreck-It Ralph' Sequel Gets a New Title!

author: Just Jared
title: 'Wreck-It Ralph' Sequel Gets a New Title!
text:
Disney just announced new details about the upcoming Wreck-It Ralph sequel, including a new title and additions to the cast!
Ralph Breaks the Internet: Wreck-It Ralph 2 is set to be released on March 9, 2018 and actors Jane Lynch and Jack McBrayer will reprise their roles from the first film.
John C. Reilly and Sarah Silverman , who played Ralph and Vanellope, were already confirmed to be a part of the sequel.
‚ÄúTo take these characters we love and have them enter the enormous world of the internet has given us so much to explore,‚Äù co-director Rich Moore said in a statement. ‚ÄúOur production team has been hard at work designing a world that takes something we all think we know ‚Äì the internet ‚Äì but shows it in a whole new, imaginative way.‚Äù
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre so excited to be working with Ralph, Vanellope von Schweetz, Fix-It Felix and Sergeant Calhoun again, and we have new characters we look forward to unveiling,‚Äù co-director Phil Johnston added. ‚ÄúAt the center of this film, as in the first one, is the relationship between Ralph and Vanellope, two once-outcasts, who in each other, found true friendship.‚Äù
Next year, he's gonna break it. üëä Ralph Breaks the Internet: Wreck-It Ralph 2 opens in theatres on March 9, 2018. pic.twitter.com/HFwiHd4JPK 
‚Äî Disney (@Disney) March 29, 2017
